title: Start
body:
<<detachFrom Renata Mia>>
<<disableCollisions Mia>>
<<moveToY Mia PedestalCheckpoint 0 60>>
<<moveToY Renata PedestalCheckpoint -30 60>>
<<moveToX Mia PedestalCheckpoint 30 60>>
<<moveToX Renata PedestalCheckpoint -20 60>>
<<faceLeft Mia>>
<<faceUp Renata>>
[[inspect]]

title: inspect
body:
<<pauseFor Renata 1.0>>
<<moveRight Renata 10 20>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.1>>
<<faceUp Renata>>
<<moveUp Mia 10 30>>
<<faceLeft Mia>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.4>>
<<moveLeft Renata 10 20>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.1>>
<<faceUp Renata>>
<<moveDown Mia 10 30>>
<<faceLeft Mia>>
Renata: Hmm, what is this?
Mia: It looks like a lotus flower![[preparetoclimb]]

title: preparetoclimb
body:
Renata: Let's take a closer look!
Mia: How? It's too high to reach.
Renata: I'll stand on your shoulders!
Mia: I saw it first!
Renata: Ok, fine.
<<moveToY Renata Mia 0 40>>
<<moveToX Renata Mia -10 40>>
<<pauseFor Renata 0.1>>
<<faceLeft Renata>>
<<moveToY Mia Renata -20 40>>
<<moveToX Mia Renata 0 40>>
<<moveUp Mia 1 10>>
[[climb]]

title: climb
body:
Mia: Up we go!
<<moveToForeground Mia>>
<<moveUp Mia 15 20>>
<<moveUp Mia 20 60>>
Renata: Ow!
<<faceLeft Mia>>
[[noticemissing]]

title: noticemissing
body:
<<pauseFor Renata 1.0>>
Mia: It looks weird. I think one petal is missing.
Renata: Oh! From the journal! There was writing about a missing petal!
Renata: Where is that paper....?
Mia-miaworriedface: Hey I'm...
<<moveRight Renata 2 10>>
<<decoupleMovementAndAnimation Mia>>
<<moveUp Mia 10 40>>
<<coupleMovementAndAnimation Mia>>
<<disableCollisions Mia>>
<<resetSorting Mia>>
<<moveDown Mia 15 120>>
<<pauseFor Mia 0.1>>
Mia-miaangryface: Hey!
<<faceUp Renata>>
Renata: Sorry.
Mia-miaannoyedface: Okay, what's in the journal?
Renata: ...'Sadly, I could not find the remaining petal. My companion soon arrived and I was able to escape, but the treasure will have to wait for another day.'
Mia: So maybe the last petal is still in here somewhere?
Renata: Let's find it!
<<enableCollisions Mia>>
<<attachTo Renata Mia>>
[[end]]
